import React,{useContext} from 'react' import './registersecion.css' import AuthContext from '../../AuthContext' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import { useState } from 'react' function RegisterSection(props) { const {t,i18n} = props let {loginUser} = useContext(AuthContext) let {user} = useContext(AuthContext) const emailRegex = /\S+@\S+\.\S+/; const registrationFields = { username:'', email:'', password1:'', password2:'' } const [regInfo,setRegInfo] = useState(registrationFields) const handleForm = (e) => { console.log(e.target) const {name,value} = e.target setRegInfo({...regInfo,[name]:value}) } return ( <>

{t('myaccount.1')}

{t('home.1')}

/

{t('myaccount.1')}

{t('login.1')}

|

{t('reg.1')}

Username *

Password *

Email *

{emailRegex.test(regInfo.email) || regInfo.email === '' ? null:

Email isn't good!

}

Re-Enter Password *

) } export default RegisterSection
